record.description: Students rally and get into the act when two professors compete for a single tenured position on the faculty in the Blackfriars' original musical comedy "Publish or Perish," presented at the University of Chicago's Mandel Hall, May 7, 8, 9. Left to right: Tim McGraw, Cathy Clark, Les Reid, David Thorn, Katie O'Brien, Mark Johnson, Ellen Martin, and Nancy Wainwright.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
